citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:55pm on 01-JUL-
2021. Arrived at facility and contacted the facility representative by phone. Representative stated that she is traveling and
is unavailable for inspection. The registrant must ensure that a responsible adult is available to accompany an inspector
upon inspection during regular business hours.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:55pm on 01-JUL-
2021. Arrived at facility and contacted the facility representative  by phone. Representative  stated that she is traveling and 
is unavailable  for inspection. The registrant must ensure that a responsible adult is available  to accompany an inspector 
upon inspection during regular business hours. 
 
 
 
End Section
